title: SMC_AxisSettingsFromAxes (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_AxisSettingsFromAxes
Reads the axis settings from the given axes and stores
them in the output
AxisSettings
.
Note: not all inputs must be connected.  For example, if
the kinematics has 3 axes, then only input
Axis0
,
Axis1
,
and
Axis2
have to be connected.
Intended for use with
SMC_Trafo_Wrapper
and
SMC_TrafoF_Wrapper
.

rows.Name: Axis0
rows.Comment: The first axis of the kinematics

rows: The second axis of the kinematics
The third axis of the kinematics
The fourth axis of the kinematics
The fifth axis of the kinematics
The sixth axis of the kinematics

rows.Name: AxisSettings
rows.Comment:
The axis settings (e.g. axis ranges) of the axesAxis0..Axis5.
This output can be connected to the inputAxisSettingsof
function blockSMC_Trafo_WrapperandSMC_TrafoF_Wrapper.
